snippet: Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher shot and killed his girlfriend, then drove to the team’s headquarters and took his own life early Saturday, the police said.
abstract: Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher fatally shoots his girlfriend Kasandra Perkins, in Kansas City, Mo, before driving to team's practice facility at Arrowhead Stadium and committing suicide; cause of violence remains unclear.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and JUDY BATTISTA
byline.contributor: Angela Macropoulos contributed reporting from West Babylon, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher shot and killed his girlfriend, then drove to the team’s headquarters and took his own life early Saturday, the police said.

headline.seo: Chiefs Linebacker Kills Woman and Later, With Coach Watching, Himself
headline.main: Chiefs Player Kills Woman and, at Stadium, Himself
headline.print_headline: Chiefs Player Kills Woman and, at Stadium, Himself
